summary: As Jamie travels in Chile, he invites an eccentric woman to join his group's quest to score a fabled hallucinogen, a move that finds him at odds with his new companion, until they drink the magic brew on a beach at the edge of the desert.
cast: Michael Cera|Gaby Hoffmann|Juan Andrés Silva|Agustín Silva|José Miguel Silva|Sebastián Silva|Manuela Baldovino|Gepe|Gracia Ariztia|Esteban Carreño|Juan Carlos Lara II|Gary Boyd|Marinés Muñoz|Nancy Castillo|Margarita Maria Nicolich|Joanan Andrea Nicolich Harixtich|Maria Isabel Pontigo Nicolich|Gina Nicolich Perez|Angelica Maria Flores Pontigo|Mariana Nicolich Aristich|Violeta Nicolich Nicolich|Natalie California California|Kasandra California Mamani|Garciela Gonzalez Cruz|Carlos Rojas|Maria Eugênia Cortez|Rosa Vega Rojas|Sol Squire|Mark Grattan
title: Crystal Fairy y el cactus mágico
